content.text:
# Ankleshwar Assembly constituency

| type=  SLA
| constituency_no    =  154
}}
Ankleshwar is one of the 182 Legislative Assembly constituencies of Gujarat state in India. It is part of Bharuch district.
List of segments
This assembly seat represents the following segments,
# Ankleshwar Taluka (Part) Villages â€“Sengpur, jitali, dadhal, Dhanturiya, Taria, Matied, Haripura, Sakkarpor, Sarfuddin, Borbhatha, Borbhatha Bet, Surwadi, Divi, Diva, Pungam, Sajod, Kanwa, Nangal, Boidara, Gadkhol, Piraman, Amboli, Adol, Hajat, Sarthan, Motwan, Telva, Piludara, Umarwada, Kapodara, Bhadkodara, Kosamadi, Bakrol, Safipura, Alonj, Pardi Idris, Karmali, Panoli, Sanjali, Kharod, Bhadi, Ravidra, Adadara, Sisodara, Utiyadara, Bharan, Ankleshwar (M), Ankleshwar (INA)
# Hansot Taluka
